full_summary:
=====================================

**Request for Proposal: Accommodations, Lecture Hall/Classrooms, and Meeting Rooms**
====================================================================================

**Reference Number:** WS4517458961-Doc4517483328

**Modification Number:** 4

**Solicitation Number:** WS4517458961

**Publication Date:** April 2, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** May 6, 2024, at 14:00 EDT

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence invites potential Offerors to provide accommodations, lecture hall/classrooms, and meeting rooms for the National Leadership Enhanced Training Session (NLETS) to be held from July 21 to 29, 2024. This training involves 41 Junior Canadian Rangers and 39 adult staff and instructors.

**Request:**

We are seeking offers to provide the following services:

* Accommodations for eighty (80) people
* A lecture hall/classrooms
* Four (4) meeting rooms
* Onsite meals and bagged meals to go

*PKG accomodate Junior and Adult Services*

**Important Notes:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 6, 2024, at 14:00 EDT.
* Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.
* Amendments to the original tender document have been made; refer to the Ariba Discovery posting for updates.

**Contact Information:**

To obtain more information, please contact:
Moeph Elgallab (he/him),
SPAC/PSPC, 
 Charlton Buildings, Suite 200
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

Phone/Email: Not Available

Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19280921?extsite=MTkyODA5MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Acknowledgement:**

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice by visiting the link provided above.

### Revised Fields
---

### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

###
